pr_title: Use Writer Thread for Cache Eviction

timeline.message:
Use Writer Thread For Eviction

If unspecified Caffeine will use the common thread pool to execute
its cache eviction logic, this can be confusing when debugging
and it causes multiple threads to "spin up" since it uses a
forkjoin pool. This patch makes the writing thread do the eviction.
